title: Design and Operation of Inquiry-Based Virtual Chemistry Laboratories

context.prior_knowledge: General chemistry basics, understanding of lab safety protocols, and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Blended course for pre-service/in-service teachers to strengthen chemistry lab instruction competency. Conducted in corporate training facilities with hands-on education using digital devices and virtual lab platforms.

learning_goals: They can replicate compound synthesis processes with 80% accuracy using virtual chemistry lab simulation tools.
They can apply a three-step process—experiment design → hypothesis formulation → result analysis—according to an inquiry-based learning model.
Based on virtual experiment data, they can identify at least three sources of experimental error and propose improvements.
In blended environments, they can develop teaching-learning plans linking online and offline experimental activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
